member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.SystemPowerOn
member.summary:
Property to return the SystemPowerOn sig details. The SystemPowerOn has both input and output sigs. The input sig is used to activate the feedback for the System Power status field in . The output sig is used to indicate that the system power is on.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.SystemPowerOff
member.summary:
Property to return the SystemPowerOff sig details. The SystemPowerOn has output sig only and is used to indicate that the system power is off.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.DisplayPowerOn
member.summary:
Property to return the DisplayPowerOn sig details. The DisplayPowerOn has both input and output sigs. The input sig is used to activate the feedback for the Display Power status field in . The output sig is used to indicate that the display power is on.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.DisplayPowerOff
member.summary:
Property to return the DisplayPowerOff sig details. The DisplayPowerOff has output sig only and is used to indicate that the display power is off.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.SystemOffWarning
member.summary:
Property to return the SystemOffWarning sig details. The SystemOffWarning has output sig only and is used to indicate that a System Off warning has been triggered by .
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.DisplayOffWarning
member.summary:
Property to return the DisplayOffWarning sig details. The DisplayOffWarning has output sig only and is used to indicate that a Display Off warning has been triggered by .
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.PingPong
member.summary:
Property not implemented.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.DisplayUsage
member.summary: Property to return the DisplayUsage sig details. The DisplayUsage has only input sig, and is used to set the lamp life of the display device. This value is routed to the Display Usage field in Fusion.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.Help
member.summary:
Property to return the Help sig details. The Help has both input and output sigs. Input sig is to receive help request from a room. Output sig is used to send a pre-defined or custom help response back to the room Touchscreen that requested help.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Property to return the ErrorMessage sig details. ErrorMessage has only input sig and used to send a formatted error message to Fusion, which displays a different icon in the Log field depending on the severity of the error.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.LogText
member.summary: Property to to return the LogText sig details. LogText has only input sig and used to send the corresponding serial data to the signal log table in the Fusion database.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.GMTTimeOfDay
member.summary:
Property to return the GMTTimeOfDay sig details. The GMTTimeOfDay has only output sig and used to receive the GMT Time of Day information. The UTC (Universal Time Code) Time of Day, expressed in the format: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ\r.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.DeviceUsage
member.summary: Property to return the DeviceUsage sig details. The DeviceUsage has only input sig and used to send the Device usage serial data to the Fusion database. This data is included in any Device Usage report that is generated with Fusion.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.TextMessage
member.summary:
Property to return the TextMessage sig details. The TextMessage has both input and output sigs. Input sig is used to send the serial string as an instant text message to the corresponding room and output sig is used to receive instant text message from a room.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.RoomView72.FreeBusyStatusToRoom
member.summary: Property to return the FreeBusyStatusToRoom sig details. The FreeBusyStatusToRoom has only input sig, and used to set the Free/busy status. This input should be connected to the corresponding output of the Crestron module, RVSE2_Single_Interface_vX.X. This module is part of the RoomView Server Edition (RVSE) software support library.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionOccupancySensor.EnableOccupancySensor
member.summary:
Property to return the EnableOccupancySensor sig details. The EnableOccupancySensor has both input and output sigs. Input sig is used to send notification to Fusion about the enabled status of the occupancy sensor. The output sig is used to indicate that Fusion has enabled the occupancy sensor (the sensor must support programmatic control).
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionOccupancySensor.DisableOccupancySensor
member.summary:
Property to return the DisableOccupancySensor sig details. The DisableOccupancySensor has only output sig and is used to indicate that Fusion has disabled the occupancy sensor (the sensor must support programmatic control).
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionOccupancySensor.RoomOccupied
member.summary: Property to return the RoomOccupied sig details. The RoomOccupied has only input sig and is used to send notification to Fusion that the room is occupied.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionOccupancySensor.OccupancySensorTimeout
member.summary:
Property to return the OccupancySensorTimeout sig details. The OccupancySensorTimeout has both input and output sigs. Input sig is used to send Fusion the current timeout value in seconds and the output sig is used to report the timeout value set by Fusion, in seconds.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionOccupancySensor.RoomOccupancyInfo
member.summary:
Property to return the RoomOccupancyInfo sig details. The RoomOccupancyInfo has both input and output sigs. The input sig is used to send the occupancy sensor type and room occupancy status to Fusion from an occupancy sensor mounted to a scheduling touch screen in XML format. The output sig is used to indicate the room occupancy status from Fusion in XML format.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.SystemPowerOn
member.summary:
Property to return the SystemPowerOn sig details. The SystemPowerOn has both input and output sigs. The input sig is used to activate the feedback for the System Power status field in RoomView. The output sig is used to indicate that the system power is on.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.SystemPowerOff
member.summary:
Property to return the SystemPowerOff sig details. The SystemPowerOff output sig only and is used to indicate that the system power is off.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.DisplayPowerOn
member.summary:
Property to return the DisplayPowerOn sig details. The DisplayPowerOn has both input and output sigs. The input sig is used to activate the feedback for the Display Power status field in RoomView and the output sig is used to indicate that the display power is on.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.DisplayPowerOff
member.summary:
Property to return the DisplayPowerOff sig details. The DisplayPowerOff has output sig only and is used to indicate that the display power is off.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.MessageBroadcastEnabled
member.summary: Property to return the MessageBroadcastEnabled sig details. The MessageBroadcastEnabled has input sig only and is used to enable message broadcasting to all connected rooms.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.AuthenticateSucceeded
member.summary:
Property to return the AuthenticateSucceeded sig details. The AuthenticateSucceeded has output sig only and is used to indicate the result (succeeded) of a credentials authentication request (made via the Fusion Serials asset).
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.AuthenticateFailed
member.summary:
Property to return the AuthenticateFailed sig details. The AuthenticateFailed has output sig only and is used to indicate the result (failed) of a credentials authentication request (made via the Fusion Serials asset).
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.DisplayUsage
member.summary: Property to return the DisplayUsage sig details. The DisplayUsage has only input sig, and is used to set the lamp life of the display device. This value is routed to the Display Usage field in Fusion.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.BroadcastMessageType
member.summary:
Property to return the BroadcastMessageType sig details. The BroadcastMessageType has only output sig, and is used to receive the broadcast message type.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.Help
member.summary:
Property to return the Help sig details. The Help has both input and output sigs. Input sig is to receive help request from a room. Output sig is to send a pre-defined or custom help response back to the room Touchscreen that requested help.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Property to return the ErrorMessage sig details. The ErrorMessage has only input sig and is used to send a formatted error message to Fusion, which displays a different icon in the Log field depending on the severity of the error.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.LogText
member.summary: Property to to return the LogText sig details. LogText has only input sig and used to send the corresponding serial data to the signal log table in the Fusion database.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.DeviceUsage
member.summary: Property to return the DeviceUsage sig details. The DeviceUsage has only input sig and used to send the Device usage serial data to the Fusion database. This data is included in any Device Usage report that is generated with Fusion.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.TextMessage
member.summary:
Property to return the TextMessage sig details. The TextMessage has both input and output sigs. Input sig is used to send the serial string as an instant text message to Fusion and the output sig is used to receive instant text message from Fusion.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.BroadcastMessage
member.summary:
Property to return the BroadcastMessage sig details. The BroadcastMessage has both input and output sigs. Input sig is used to send the corresponding broadcast message response to Fusion and output sig is used to receive broadcast message from Fusion.
The event will trigger with .

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.FreeBusyStatusToRoom
member.summary: Property to return the FreeBusyStatusToRoom sig details. The FreeBusyStatusToRoom has only input sig, and used to set the Free/busy status. This input should be connected to the corresponding output of the Crestron module, RVSE2_Single_Interface_vX.X. This module is part of the RoomView Server Edition (RVSE) software support library.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.AuthenticateRequest
member.summary: Property to return the AuthenticateRequest sig details. The AuthenticateRequest has only input sig and used to send Windows domain credentials to Fusion for authentication against Active Directory.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharpPro.Fusion.FusionRoom.GroupMembership
member.summary:
Property to return the GroupMembership sig details. The GroupMembership has only output sig and used to report the user's domain groups as the result of a successful domain credentials authentication.
The event will trigger with .
